Ice steps forward her robotic smile lighting the room. "Thank you,. and you
assume correctly, my names Ice, this is Razor Claw, and I believe you've
already spoken to Lunarpine. (When you gave him landing clearance.)

Razor Claw nodded a gesture of hello as he stepped to Ice's left. again he
nervously looked around the room at the crowd of bots.

Lunarpine stepped to Ice's right side as a gesture for her to go first. She
to the table and sat. It wasn't very comfortable to have her weight shifted
like this so she squirmed into a more leaning pose to get comfortable. once
situated Lunarpine and Razor Claw took thier seats at her sides. "So whats
new Kluster?" Lunarpine asked obviously looking for straight forward quick
answers.

(So far who's there? If I read correctly it's just Wolveritron, Kluster and
a couple others, if I'm wrong please correct me.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2000 7:18 AM
Subject: Re: Who's at the CF for the meeting?


> ::Kluster/Proto::
>
> Proto spins around as Hot Rod zooms past him, following the bot back
> to the Cybertronian Fire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster looks down at the panel in front of him as it alerts him of a
> bot in the vicinity. He pushes a button to send HotRod a transmission.
>
> "Welcome back, HotRod," he says. The Maximal hadn't been at base for a
> while, "We're about to have a meeting, please report to the conference
> room."
>
> The Maximal looks up as Lunarpine and company enter, looking the three
> over.
>
> "Hello. I'm assuming you came for the meeting. Please sit down."
>
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Lunarpine followed the scent to the meeting room. the door opened
> and he
> > faced a handful of other bots, some he knew some were strangers.
> (Who's at
> > the meeting so far?) he entered followed by Ice and Razor Claw. Ice
> > transformed to her robot mode, a bots head on a furry body with
> claws and
> > Polar bear legs. she couldn't fully transform, this was as close as
> she
> > could come. "I never imagined there were so many of us"She thought
> as they
> > entered
> >
> > Razor Claw transformed to bot mode and looked around. it was hard
> for him to
> > fathom that one day he might be linked to one of these bots. If
> Veratis'
> > dreams came true there wouldn't be any factions, there would be only
> one.(No
> > highlander reference intended.) He glanced around the room, all the
> bots
> > looked more like targets than allies to him.
> >
> > "Razor Claw calm down, we're not here to fight, we're here because
> they need
> > us, and we need them." she telepathically tried to calm him but his
> emotions
> > were filled with fear and hatred for every bot in the room. A
> veritable fuse
> > waiting to reach the firecracker, all he needed was an excuse
>
>
>
>
>
